mapper.select: select top 1 userid, passwd1, custnm, pernm, useyn, perid, custcd from TB_XUSERS where userid=#{userid} and passwd1=#{passwd1} and useyn = '1'

select A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, B.cltcd as cltcd, substring(A.fdeldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(A.fdeldate, 7,2) as fdeldatetext, A.fdeldate as fdeldate, A.fdelnum as fdelnum, A.fdelseq as fdelseq, isnull(A.pcode,'') as pcode, isnull(D.phm_pnam,'') as pname, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(A.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(A.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(A.delseq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.qty,0) as qty, isnull(A.uamt,0) as uamt, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm from TB_DA035 A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA034 B WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_XCLIENT C WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_CA501 D WITH (NOLOCK) where A.spjangcd = B.spjangcd and A.fdeldate = B.fdeldate and A.fdelnum=B.fdelnum AND B.cltcd = C.cltcd and A.pcode = D.phm_pcod and A.fdeldate = #{todate} and ( Len(isnull(A.deldate , '')) = 0)

select A.custcd AS custcd, A.spjangcd as spjangcd, B.cltcd as cltcd, substring(A.fdeldate, 5,2) + '/' + substring(A.fdeldate, 7,2) as fdeldatetext, A.fdeldate as fdeldate, A.fdelnum as fdelnum, A.fdelseq as fdelseq, isnull(A.pcode,'') as pcode, isnull(D.phm_pnam,'') as pname, isnull(A.grade,'') as grade, isnull(A.width,0) as width, isnull(A.thick,0) as thick, isnull(A.color,'') as color, isnull(E.deldate,'') as deldate, isnull(E.delnum,'') as delnum, isnull(E.seq,'') as delseq, isnull(A.qty,0) as qty, isnull(C.cltnm,'') as cltnm, E.lotno as lotno from TB_DA035 A WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA034 B WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_XCLIENT C WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_CA501 D WITH (NOLOCK), TB_DA037H E WITH (NOLOCK) where A.spjangcd = B.spjangcd and A.fdeldate = B.fdeldate and A.fdelnum=B.fdelnum AND B.cltcd = C.cltcd and A.pcode = D.phm_pcod and A.deldate + A.delnum = E.deldate + E.delnum AND A.deldate = #{todate} and ( Len(isnull(A.deldate , '')) > 0) ORDER BY E.deldate, E.delnum, E.seq
select max(delnum) from TB_DA036 where deldate = #{fdeldate}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_da037 where deldate = #{deldate} and delnum=#{delnum} and delseq=#{delseq}
delete from tb_da037H where deldate = #{deldate} and delnum=#{delnum} and lotno =#{lotno}
mapper.update: update TB_DA006_IMPORT_PANNEL set deldate = null, delnum = null, delseq =null where deldate = #{deldate} and delnum=#{delnum} and delseq =#{delseq}
update TB_DA006_IMPORT_WINGBADY set deldate = null, delnum = null, delseq =null where deldate = #{deldate} and delnum=#{delnum} and delseq =#{delseq}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_da036 (custcd, spjangcd, deldate, delnum, deltype, cltcd, perid, taxcls,setcls, store, domcls, moncls, monrate, sunamt, sunflag,inperid, taxflag, selflag, reqdate, mcltdv, banflag, ppgun, pagrb, indate, grpflag) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{deldate}, #{delnum}, #{deltype}, #{cltcd}, #{perid}, #{taxcls},#{setcls}, #{store}, #{domcls}, #{moncls}, #{monrate}, #{sunamt}, #{sunflag}, #{inperid}, #{taxflag},#{selflag},#{reqdate},#{mcltdv},#{banflag},#{ppgun},#{pagrb},#{indate},#{grpflag})

insert into tb_da037 (custcd, spjangcd, deldate, delnum, delseq, pcode, qty, cuamt, uamt, samt, tamt, mamt, lotqty, indate,inperid) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{deldate}, #{delnum}, #{delseq}, #{pcode}, #{qty}, 0, #{uamt}, #{samt}, #{tamt}, #{mamt}, 0, #{indate}, #{inperid})

insert into tb_da037h (custcd, spjangcd, deldate, delnum, seq, store, pcode, lotno, qty, uamt) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{deldate}, #{delnum}, #{seq}, #{store}, #{pcode}, #{lotno}, #{qty}, #{uamt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_XLOGIN WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE custcd = #{custcd} AND ipaddr = #{ipaddr} AND onoffdt = #{onoffdt} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_XLOGIN (custcd, userid, ipaddr, onoffdt, custnm, usernm, ondate, ofdate, onoffdv) values ( #{custcd}, #{userid}, #{ipaddr}, #{onoffdt}, #{custnm}, #{usernm}, GETDATE(), null, '0' )
mapper.update: update TB_XLOGIN set ofdate=GETDATE(), onoffdv='1' where custcd = #{custcd} AND userid = #{userid} AND onoffdt = #{onoffdt} and ipaddr = #{ipaddr}
mapper.select: select ISNULL(phm_pcod, '') as phm_pcod, ISNULL(phm_pnam, '') as phm_pnam, ISNULL(phm_size, '') as phm_size, ISNULL(phm_unit, '') as phm_unit, ISNULL(code88, '') as code88 from tb_ca501 where phm_cust = 'THEMOON' and code88 = #{code88}

SELECT ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.wono,'') as wono, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.lotno,'') as lotno, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.plan_no,'') as plan_no, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.cltcd,'') as cltcd, ISNULL(TB_XCLIENT.cltnm,'') as cltnm, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.pcode,'') as pcode, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.pname,'') as pname, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.psize,'') as psize, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.punit,'') as punit, CONVERT(INT, (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wotqt - TB_FPLAN_WORK.wbdqt)) as wfokqt, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN_WORK.wendt,'') as wendt, CONVERT(int ,SUM(TB_FPLAN_WORK.wotqt - TB_FPLAN_WORK.wbdqt) OVER ()) as wfokqt_sum FROM TB_FPLAN WITH(NOLOCK), TB_FPLAN_WORK WITH(NOLOCK), TB_XCLIENT WITH(NOLOCK), TB_CA501 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (TB_FPLAN.custcd = TB_FPLAN_WORK.custcd) and (TB_FPLAN.spjangcd = TB_FPLAN_WORK.spjangcd) AND (TB_FPLAN.plan_no = TB_FPLAN_WORK.plan_no) AND (TB_FPLAN.cls_flag = '2') AND (TB_FPLAN.pcode = #{pcode}) -- AND (TB_FPLAN.pcode like CONCAT('%','%','%')) AND (TB_FPLAN.custcd = TB_XCLIENT.custcd) AND (TB_FPLAN.cltcd = TB_XCLIENT.cltcd) AND (TB_FPLAN.custcd = TB_CA501.phm_cust) AND (TB_FPLAN.pcode = TB_CA501.phm_pcod) AND (TB_FPLAN.decision = '0') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.custcd = 'THEMOON') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.spjangcd = 'ZZ') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wseq = '01') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wflag = '00010') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wendt = #{wendt}) order by tb_fplan.wono, tb_fplan.cltcd
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FPLAN SET cls_flag = '4', close_date = #{close_date}, end_qty = #{end_qty}, close_perid = #{close_perid}, wflag = '00030', wseq = '03', decision = '0' where custcd = 'THEMOON' AND spjangcd = 'ZZ' AND plan_no = #{plan_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_XLOGIN_H ( londt, custcd, spjangcd, userid, winid, buton, ipaddr, usernm, winnm, tbkey ) VALUES (GETDATE(), 'THEMOON', 'ZZ', #{userid}, #{winid}, #{buton}, #{ipaddr}, #{usernm}, #{winnm}, '')
INSERT INTO TB_FPLAN_WTIME ( custcd, spjangcd, plan_no, wseq, seq, wflag, wfrdt, wtrdt, wopdv, wdtcd, wrerm ) values ( 'THEMOON', 'ZZ', #{plan_no}, '03', '01', '00030', #{time}, #{time}, '0', '','' )
mapper.select: select CONCAT(#{gs_today},' ',CONVERT(varchar(12), GETDATE(), 114))

SELECT ISNULL(TB_FPLAN_WORK.wendt,'') as wendt, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.wono,'') as wono, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.lotno,'') as lotno, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.plan_no,'') as plan_no, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.cltcd,'') as cltcd, ISNULL(TB_XCLIENT.cltnm,'') as cltnm, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.pcode,'') as pcode, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN_WORK.wflag,'') as wflag, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.pname,'') as pname, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.psize,'') as psize, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN.punit,'') as punit, CONVERT(int, ISNULL(TB_FPLAN_WORK.wotqt, 0)) as wotqt FROM TB_FPLAN WITH(NOLOCK), TB_FPLAN_WORK WITH(NOLOCK), TB_XCLIENT WITH(NOLOCK), TB_CA501 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE (TB_FPLAN.custcd = TB_FPLAN_WORK.custcd) and (TB_FPLAN.spjangcd = TB_FPLAN_WORK.spjangcd) AND (TB_FPLAN.plan_no = TB_FPLAN_WORK.plan_no) AND (TB_FPLAN.cls_flag = '4') AND (TB_FPLAN.custcd = TB_XCLIENT.custcd) AND (TB_FPLAN.cltcd = TB_XCLIENT.cltcd) AND (TB_FPLAN.custcd = TB_CA501.phm_cust) AND (TB_FPLAN.pcode = TB_CA501.phm_pcod) AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.custcd = 'THEMOON') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.spjangcd = 'ZZ') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wseq = '03') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wflag = '00030') AND (TB_FPLAN_WORK.wendt = #{gs_today}) ORDER BY TB_FPLAN.wono, TB_FPLAN.cltcd
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FPLAN SET cls_flag = '2', close_date = '', end_qty = 0, close_perid = '', wflag = '00010', wseq = '01', decision = '0' where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_fplan_work where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no} and wseq = '03'
delete from tb_fplan_w030 where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no} and wseq = '03'
delete from tb_fplan_owork where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no} and wseq = '03'
delete from tb_fplan_wperid where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no} and wseq = '03'
delete from tb_fplan_wtime where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no} and wseq = '03'
mapper.select: select ISNULL(phm_pcod,'') as pcode, ISNULL(phm_pnam,'') as pname, ISNULL(phm_size,'') as psize, ISNULL(phm_unit,'') as punit, ISNULL(code88,'') as lotno, ISNULL(dbo.DF_TB_CA601_ENDDATE('THEMOON', 'ZZ', #{gs_today}, 'P01', phm_pcod),'') as stdate, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10) ,dbo.DF_TB_CA602_PCODE_LOTNO_JQTY('THEMOON', 'ZZ', 'P01', phm_pcod, code88, dbo.DF_TB_CA601_ENDDATE('THEMOON', 'ZZ', #{gs_today}, 'P01', phm_pcod), #{gs_today})), '') as jaeqty from tb_ca501 with(nolock) where phm_cust = 'THEMOON' and code88 = #{code88}
select ISNULL(dbo.df_tb_ca602_pcode_jqty('THEMOON', 'ZZ', 'P01', #{phm_pcode}, #{stdate}, #{gs_today}),'') as jaeqty from dual
select sildate, pcode, lotno, indate, banflag from tb_ca630 where pcode=#{pcode} and sildate = #{gs_today} and lotno = #{lotno}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_ca630 SET custcd = 'THEMOON', spjangcd = 'ZZ', store = 'P01',sildate = #{gs_today}, pcode = #{pcode}, lotno = #{lotno}, jaeqty = #{jaeqty}, jaeuamt = '0', jaeamt = '0', silqty = #{silqty}, siluamt = 0, silamt = 0, banflag = '0', banyn = '0', acc_flag = '0', acc_spdate = '', acc_spnum = '', sildv = '', remarks = '', indate = #{gs_today}, inperid = #{gs_perid} where sildate = #{gs_today} and pcode = #{pcode} and lotno = #{lotno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FPLAN_SUB (custcd, spjangcd, plan_no, plan_seq, wodv, close_date, close_perid, end_qty, strqty, daeqty, badqty, wram, woam, cls_flag, remark, qcdate, qcqty, qcgb, deldate, delnum, delseq, delflag, selps, selck, perid) values ( 'THEMOON', 'ZZ', #{plan_no}, '01', '0', #{gs_today}, #{close_perid}, #{wotqt}, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, '1', '', '', 0, '', '', '', '', '0', '', '0', '' )
mapper.delete: delete from TB_FPLAN_SUB where custcd = 'THEMOON' and spjangcd = 'ZZ' and plan_no = #{plan_no} and plan_seq = '01'
mapper.select: SELECT indate, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CA630 WHERE indate = #{gs_today} AND lotno = #{code88} ) THEN '등록' ELSE '미등록' END AS Whether FROM TB_CA630 WHERE indate = #{gs_today} AND lotno = #{code88};
SELECT ISNULL(sortno, '') AS sortno, ISNULL(hcod, '') AS hcod, ISNULL(hnam, '') AS hnam FROM TB_CLTCD WITH(NOLOCK)
select isnull(spjangnm, '') as spjangnm, isnull(spjangcd, '') as spjangcd from TB_XA012 WITH(NOLOCK)
select isnull(cltcd, '') as cltcd, isnull(cltnm, '') as cltnm from TB_XCLIENT where cltnm like CONCAT('%',#{cltnm},'%')
SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(08), DATEADD(YEAR, -1, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{frdate})), 112) as jfrdate, CONVERT(CHAR(08), DATEADD(YEAR, -1, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{todate})), 112) as jtodate from dual
select isnull(store, '') as store, isnull(storenm, '') as storenm from TB_CA504
select code, cnam, cord from vw_ca510_002 where code <> '00'
select isnull(phm_pcod,'')as phm_pcod , isnull(phm_pnam, '') as phm_pnam, isnull(phm_size, '') as phm_size from TB_CA501 where phm_pnam like concat('%',#{phm_pnam},'%')
SELECT bgroup, bgrpnm, sortno from TB_CA503_01 with(nolock) where pgun like CONCAT('%', #{pgun2}, '%') and hcod like CONCAT('%', #{hcod2}, '%')
SELECT TB_JC002.CUSTCD, TB_JC002.DIVICD, TB_JC002.DIVINM FROM TB_JC002 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE TB_JC002.kukcd = '03' AND TB_JC002.divicd <> 'CC00030'
select sysmain from tb_xusers where userid = #{userid}
